gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Magic 112, Pistons 109
gameRecap.excerpt: Orlando defeats Detroit, 112-109. For Orlando, Paolo Banchero nails the game-winner and recorded 15 points, five rebounds, and two blocks with help from Moritz Wagner (14 points, seven rebounds) and Jalen Suggs (14 points, five assists, two steals) to lead the way. Cade Cunningham led the way with 26 points, seven rebounds, and four assists while Jalen Duren tallied 16 points, 11 rebounds, and four blocks for Detroit in the losing effort. Orlando wins and improves to 32-25 on the season, while Detroit moves to 8-48 with the loss
